Author: AntwerpPeter

Comment: > “If you lose ultimately at the court but millions of people now believe that all of these institutions are hotbeds of discrimination, that they don’t provide any benefits to the communities in which they operate, that they don’t produce anything of value,” she said, adding, “that might be a win if you are hostile to higher education institutions.”  I don't think there's any significant number of people whose opinion of Harvard was or will be changed by Trump's allegations against it.   Bubba Maga was never Harvard's core audience anyway.  And I suspect even Jewish Ivy League students aren't thinking they "don’t provide any benefits to the communities in which they operate" they just want to see leadership take a different stance on the Palestinian protests.   How many Jews are dropping out of Harvard and Yale and going to state schools in Florida that DeSantis has gutted of all intellectualism?
